title: Odion Ighalo - Wikipedia
snippet: On 29 January 2022, he signed for Saudi club Al-Hilal. He finished his first season as the league's top scorer with 24 goals. On 26 February 2023, he scored four goals in a 7–0 win over Al-Duhail in the Champions League semi-final. On 15 August 2023, Ighalo joined Al-Wehda on a free transfer.
